body:
I decided to try use the HVAC systems and assign the cooling/heating availability that way. However, it is creating the schedule for every zone (thus having duplicate schedules) which causes the simulation to crash with sever error!

I understand that Honeybee is moving to have HVAC systems applied via openstudio outside of rhino/GH itself, but could I request the component for ideal loads be fixed to not create duplicate schedules? =)



Anyone know of a way to get the ideal loads to only turn on/off to a schedule?



Find attached the gh file for the topic.



Kind Regards,

Elzine
